issue.title: Orbit view controller movement swapped for X/Y hotkeys

content.raw: I think motion in the camera frame would be quite useful, the only problem I see is that it is not clear to the user where those axes are, because they're not displayed on the GUI. Since the frame is always fixed though, we could explain that somewhere, maybe in the [hotkeys](http://gazebosim.org/hotkeys.html) table.
